*Code reviews*

Even questions about the code might trigger improvements. You need to sign in with a Google account but don't need to join the project: See how reviews work on http://code.google.com/p/support/wiki/CodeReviews 

In short: 
  * browse the source code online
  * double click a code line to enter you comment or question
  * when done publish your comment so others get notified
